name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - S  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a kitten, and not a full-grown cat?
questions.explanation:
Saffron.

	Saffron is a white kitten with yellow spots on her face and body.  She is very fluffy and fuzzy. "Kittens bounding to and fro This way that way, off they goThey're all fun, but the cutest fellow Is a kitten that is white and yellow!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Samson.

	Sammy is a rainbow colored bear.  Samson is a white dog with brown splotches on his body, and has dark brown ears.  His is very soft and furry. "Lets take a walk around the parkI promise that I will not barkThe thing I really want to doIs spend the afternoon with you!"

questions.text: What kind of creature is Scaly?
questions.explanation:
Lizard.

	Scaly is a lizard that likes to climb cacti!  That must be painful. "I love to lie, basking in the sunLiving in the desert sure is funClimbing up cactus, avoiding a spikeI'm the Beanie you're sure to like!"

questions.text: What kind of animal is Scorch?
questions.explanation:
Dragon.

	Scorch is a brown dragon with red and shimmering wings.  His tongue sticks out, and it is red. "A magical mystery with glowing wingsMade by wizards and other thingsKnown to breathe fire with lots of smokeScorch is really a friendly ol' bloke!"

questions.text: Which of these is related to Runner the Beanie Baby, being a ferret?
questions.explanation:
Shiloh.

	Shiloh is a black footed ferret.  He is mostly a brownish orange color, with black feet and a white belly.  He has white eyebrows, too!  He does not own a poem.

questions.text: What kind of creature is Slowpoke?
options: There is a Beanie Baby named Slowpoke for all of these choices.
questions.explanation:
Sloth.

	Slowpoke is a sloth.  Sloths are slow moving creatures that live in trees.  They have upside-down fur, and they can move so slowly, algae grows on their fur! "Look up in the sky to the top of the treeWhat in the world is that you see?A little sloth as sweet as can beMunching on leaves very slowly!"

questions.text: Which of these is a flat Beanie Baby fox?
questions.explanation:
Sly.

	Both Sly and Slick are foxes, and Sneaks and Snoops are both raccoons.  However, Sly is the only flat Beanie Baby of the bunch.  He is mostly a reddish brown color with a white belly, although rarer versions do not have a white belly at all. "Sly is a fox and tricky is hePlease don't chase him, let him beIf you want him, just say whenHe'll peek out from his den!"

questions.text: What color is Smudges the dog?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	Smudges is a black dog with a red collar.  His fur is extremely curly and soft.  Smudges likes to have dark fur because the dirt he plays in hides better. "My furry coat is black as nightAnd boy, I'm glad it isn't whiteI love to play in dirt and grimeIt's how I like to spend my time!"

questions.text: Which of these owls looks EXACTLY like KnOWLedge?
questions.explanation:
Snowdrop.

	Snowdrop is a snowy owl, just like KnOWLedge, with white feathers with black specks on the wings.  Summit looks a LOT like KnOWLedge, except the feathers on the stomach is much longer and softer, and silkier. "The northern winds begin to blow Noses and cheeks so red they glow And then snowflakes start to appear That means that winter's finally here!"

questions.text: What kind of animal is Stony?
questions.explanation:
Rodent.

	Stony is an American pika.  Stony does not have a tail, and looks much like a porcupine and a guinea pig combined.  Pikas live in the western parts of North America.  Stony does not have a poem.
